metadata.title: CVE-2024-5564 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in libndp. This flaw allows a local malicioususer to cause a buffer overflow in NetworkManager, triggered by sending amalformed IPv6 router advertisement packet. This issue occurred as libndpwas not correctly validating the route length information.

criterions.comment: libndp package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
